testcase.name: Get available pets and assert result
testcase.system-out: Given GET request on https://petstore.swagger.io, /v2/pet/findByStatus?status=available for available pets.passed Then Validate GET response..................................................passed

testcase.name: POST a pet to store and validate result
testcase.system-out: Given POST request on https://petstore.swagger.io, /v2/pet for { "id": 0, "category": { "id": 0, "name": "string" }, "name": "doggie", "photoUrls": [ "string" ], "tags": [ { "id": 0, "name": "string" } ], "status": "available"} pet to store.passed Then Validate pet is added to store.........................................passed

testcase.name: Add a product to cart
testcase.system-out: When User clicks on Home button.............................................passed When User clicks on categoryLaptops.........................................passed And User clicks on Laptop Sony vaio i5......................................passed Then Header should be Sony vaio i5..........................................passed When User clicks on AddToCart...............................................passed Then Product Added pop-up should appear.....................................passed And User accepts pop-up confirmation........................................passed

testcase.system-out: When User clicks on Home button.............................................passed When User clicks on categoryLaptops.........................................passed And User clicks on Laptop Dell i7 8gb.......................................passed Then Header should be Dell i7 8gb...........................................passed When User clicks on AddToCart...............................................passed Then Product Added pop-up should appear.....................................passed And User accepts pop-up confirmation........................................passed

testcase.name: Navigate to cart
testcase.system-out: When User clicks cart button................................................passed Then Products should be added in cart.......................................passed

testcase.name: Place order and capture purchase details
testcase.system-out: When User fetch total amount................................................passed When User clicks on place order.............................................passed And Fill form details MAYANK JAIN,INDIA,DELHI,123456789,DEC,2020............passed And User click on Purchase button...........................................passed Then Confirmation Thank you for your purchase! should be displayed..........passed
